name: Clockt'in
description:
Clockt'in!

Welcome to Clockt's amazing adventure to find his best friend! 

In order to find him, you'll need to travel through time and space to bring him back home.

To move, use the A and D keys to move left and right respectively, use the space bar to jump over obstacles and climb walls. Touch the clock at the end of the level to complete the level!

System Requirements:

Internet Browser: Google Chrome, Opera, Firefox etc.

PC, Keyboard, Mouse, Monitor Display, Internet Connection, Speakers.
